google_play_reviews.content: This app is great! I like that I am not constantly bombarded with ads or prompts to leave a review. The hints section saves quite a bit of time. All in all a very well put together password hasher.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Ryan! Thank you for the review!
It is the highest pleasure to work for such warm words.
I promise to do not include neither ads nor other rating increase tricks.
If you have any improvement proposals, shoot them to me at oleg.codev@gmail.com.
